title: Numeric TextBox with min and max value and decimal place and comma formatting
body: I know that text boxes can be customized easily. But the UWP textboxes are not that god when it comes to numeric input. I'm currently working on a software that has a lot of numeric input. That's why I'm suggesting a specialized textbox for numbers.
